item.title: 对冲基金追逐日本大选刀锋般的利润
item.description: 对冲基金正在采用一系列策略，以从日本这场悬而未决的领导力竞争中获利，包括计划抛售股票、押注日元走强或削减风险资产。【原文：Hedge funds are employing a range of strategies to profit from Japan’s too-close-to-call leadership race, including plans to sell stocks, bet on a stronger yen, or trim risk assets.】

item.title: 香港融资成本因美联储减息和贷款放缓而下降
item.description: 据分析师称，受美联储降息预期和贷款需求疲软的影响，香港的隔夜拆借成本到年底可能会降至3%左右。【原文：The cost of overnight borrowing in Hong Kong could fall to about 3% by year-end, driven by expected interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve and weak loan demand, according to analysts.】

item.title: 住友生命保险据说将采取措施避免标记债券损失
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，住友生命保险株式会社正在采取一项不同寻常的措施，以避免减记其债务资产的损失，并承诺在这些资产处于亏损状态时绝不出售。【原文：Sumitomo Life Insurance Co. is taking an unusual step to avoid writing down losses on its debt assets, promising to never sell them while they are in the red, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本领导层希望之星为争夺权力讨好反对党
item.description: 领导日本执政党自民党的热门候选人需要与反对党合作，以帮助在政策上取得进展，并稳定自民党摇摇欲坠的政权。【原文：The top contenders to lead Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party will need to collaborate with opposition parties to help make progress on policy and stabilize the LDP’s shaky grip on power.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将与华尔街同步下跌：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周五开盘走软，这表明全球股市在华尔街创下新高后，创纪录的涨势可能会得到喘息。【原文：Asian stocks were primed for a softer open Friday, signaling the record rally in global equities may be due for a breather after fresh highs on Wall Street.】

item.title: 第一品牌贷款人向 "黑盒子 "伸出援手
item.description: First Brands 集团的贷款人因该汽车零部件供应商使用资产负债表外融资而焦头烂额，他们迅速筹集了 11 亿美元的紧急救命钱，以防止该公司彻底倒闭。但是，他们的律师说，为了完成这笔贷款，这些公司不得不放弃了通常情况下对此类巨额贷款所要求的尽职调查。【原文：First Brands Group lenders burned by the auto parts supplier’s use of off-balance-sheet financing quickly assembled a $1.1 billion emergency lifeline to prevent the business from completely unraveling. But to pull it off their lawyer said the firms had to forgo the amount of diligence they’d normally require for such a sizable loan.】

item.title: 巴西与中国联手创建新的投资基金

item.title: 高管称 Alphabet 计划出售或分拆 Verily 部门
item.description: 一位高级管理人员周四作证说，Alphabet 公司过去两年来一直在努力使其生命科学部门 Verily 在技术上脱钩，以便出售或分拆。【原文：Alphabet Inc. has been working for the past two years to technologically decouple its life sciences unit Verily so that it can be sold or spun off, a senior executive testified Thursday.】

item.title: 美国银行储备进一步下降，跌破 3 万亿美元关键关口
item.description: 作为美联储决定继续缩减资产负债表的一个关键因素，美国银行系统的储备金连续第八周下滑，创下了低于 3 万亿美元的新纪录。【原文：The US banking system’s reserves, a key factor in the Federal Reserve’s decision to keep shrinking its balance sheet, tumbled for the eighth straight week to a new mark below $3 trillion.】

item.title: Golub 的私人信用 CLO 为保险公司提供了罕见的期限游戏
item.description: 私人信贷公司 Golub Capital 出售了一种抵押贷款义务，该义务将投资者锁定在证券上的时间比一般交易更长，因为保险公司为寻找持有时间更长的资产而将资金投入私人信贷。【原文：Private credit firm Golub Capital sold a collateralized loan obligation that locks investors into the securities for longer than typical deals, as insurers pour money into private credit in their search for longer-held assets.】

item.title: 梅洛尼力推减税和国防政策，意大利赤字率达到 3

item.title: 瑞银基金面临第一品牌 5 亿美元的风险敞口
